InstructionData.Title: Farming incl lighting
InstructionData.Author: RZR0
InstructionData.Instructions:
define hashGrowLight -1758710260 define hashHarvie 958056199 define hashHydroponicDevice -1841632400
define addrIdentifiedTrays 384
alias mainVarDeviceCount r1 alias mainVarLoopIdx r2 alias mainVarCurDeviceAddr r3 alias mainVarCurDeviceNameHash r4
alias findDevicesParamArrayAddr r1 alias findDevicesVarMinHash r2 alias findDevicesVarMaxHash r3 alias findDevicesVarCurHash r4 alias findDevicesVarCurCheckHash r5 alias findDevicesVarItemCount r6 alias findDevicesVarArrayCurAddr r7
alias performFarmingParamNameHash r1 alias performFarmingVarQuantity r2 alias performFarmingVarCounter r3
main: push ra jal lightCycle pop ra push ra push addrIdentifiedTrays jal findDevices pop mainVarDeviceCount pop ra move mainVarLoopIdx 1 mainLoopStart: bgt mainVarLoopIdx mainVarDeviceCount mainLoopEnd add mainVarCurDeviceAddr addrIdentifiedTrays mainVarLoopIdx #> read arr move r0 sp move sp mainVarCurDeviceAddr peek mainVarCurDeviceNameHash move sp r0 s d0 Setting mainVarLoopIdx push ra push r1 push r2 push r3 push mainVarCurDeviceNameHash jal performFarming pop r3 pop r2 pop r1 pop ra mainLoopContinue: add mainVarLoopIdx mainVarLoopIdx 1 yield j mainLoopStart mainLoopEnd: yield j main
# () -> None lightCycle: sb hashGrowLight On 0 sleep 300 sb hashGrowLight On 1 sleep 600 j ra
# (arrayAddr) -> deviceCount findDevices: pop findDevicesParamArrayAddr #> store arr move r0 sp move sp findDevicesParamArrayAddr push HASH("1") push HASH("2") push HASH("3") push HASH("4") push HASH("5") push HASH("6") push HASH("7") push HASH("8") push HASH("9") sub findDevicesVarItemCount sp findDevicesParamArrayAddr # calc array size move sp r0 #< store arr push findDevicesVarItemCount j ra
# (nameHash) -> None performFarming: pop performFarmingParamNameHash lbns r0 hashHydroponicDevice performFarmingParamNameHash 0 Occupied Average beq r0 0 performFarmingPlanting lbns r0 hashHydroponicDevice performFarmingParamNameHash 0 Growth Average blt r0 4 performFarmingEnd performFarmingLoopHarvestStart: sbn hashHarvie performFarmingParamNameHash Harvest 1 yield lbns r0 hashHydroponicDevice performFarmingParamNameHash 0 Occupied Average beq r0 1 performFarmingLoopHarvestStart performFarmingPlanting: yield lbns r0 hashHarvie performFarmingParamNameHash 0 Occupied Average bne r0 1 performFarmingEnd sbn hashHarvie performFarmingParamNameHash Plant 1 performFarmingEnd: j ra
